title: November is magic
subtitle: Perfect solution
text: Holly Golightly is a flighty Manhattan party girl, who expects money for the powder room as well as for cab fare for her companionship. She has even gotten a lucrative once weekly job to visit notorious convict Sally Tomato in Sing Sing, she needing to report back to Sally.
